title: 204: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 7 (The Men Are “Weens” + Ivan For Bachelor! + Climax Competition?!)
itunes:title: 204: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 7 (The Men Are “Weens” + Ivan For Bachelor! + Climax Competition?!)
description:
(IMPORTANT NOTE: Broads, ALAS, we had some audio issues at the top of the episode this week - the good quality audio and official BACHELORETTE RECAP begin at (16:04)!)** 

First Jess chats some current #bach tea that her and Bekah will be covering more next week (0:00 - 7:40), then The Broads dicuss their initial episode thoughts + Bachelor Mansion for rent (7:50 - 16:00), then they dive into this week’s Bachelorette recap (16:04)!


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
